## getArrayConstructor() function

Returns an array with the data type specified as parameter.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function getArrayConstructor(attr: BufferElementType): Float32ArrayConstructor | Uint8ArrayConstructor | Uint16ArrayConstructor | Uint32ArrayConstructor | Int8ArrayConstructor | Int16ArrayConstructor | Int32ArrayConstructor;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  attr | [BufferElementType](./harp-datasource-protocol.bufferelementtype.md) | specifies which type of data is being stored in the array |

<b>Returns:</b>

Float32ArrayConstructor \| Uint8ArrayConstructor \| Uint16ArrayConstructor \| Uint32ArrayConstructor \| Int8ArrayConstructor \| Int16ArrayConstructor \| Int32ArrayConstructor
